title: Critique My Design: Pilcrow Specimen (wallpaper)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Pilcrow%20Specimen%20(preview)_4448.png)

[{Full 1920x1200 version here.}](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181353/http:/img211.imageshack.us/img211/8050/pilcrowspecimen.png)

It's as simple as the title states. It's also a custom character. I have not much more to say, although I do hope you enjoy viewing it.
author: xo

comments.content:
I like it. There are two light gray edges, which are a bit too light in my opinion. And I would probably a bit more experiment with the background.

Do you know **[La Linea](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012181353/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=dv2ORENVqEA)**?

No, I didn't know of La Linea. What exactly do you mean by the light gray edges? Do you mean the outlines on the pilcrow? I've thought of making the stripes in the background align with the shadow, but it didn't seem to balance right in my opinion.
Oh, the character outlines. That's an easy fix. Thanks!
